CRIT_I.name: Crit Table I
CRIT_I.description: Critical hits table I for Level 0 and Wizards.

0-.title: Force of blow shivers your weapon free of your grasp!
0-.effect: Force of blow shivers your weapon free of your grasp! Inflict +1d6 damage with this strike and you are disarmed.

1.title: Opportunistic strike
1.effect: Opportunistic strike! Inflict +1d3 damage with this strike.

2.title: Foe jabbed in the eye!
2.effect: Foe jabbed in the eye! Ugly bruising and inflict +1d4 damage with this strike.

3.title: Stunning crack to forehead!
3.effect: Stunning crack to forehead! Inflict +1d3 damage with this strike, and the foe falls to the bottom of the initiative count next round.

4.title: Strike to foe’s kneecap!
4.effect: Strike to foe’s kneecap! Inflict +1d4 damage with this strike and the foe suffers a -10’ penalty to speed until healed.

5.title: Solid strike to torso!
5.effect: Solid strike to torso! Inflict +1d6 damage with this strike.

6.title: Lucky strike disarms foe!
6.effect: Lucky strike disarms foe! You gain a free attack if the enemy stoops to retrieve his weapon.

7.title: Smash foe’s hand!
7.effect: Smash foe’s hand! Inflict +2d3 damage with this strike. You break two of the enemy’s fingers.

8.title: Numbing strike!
8.effect: Numbing strike! Cursing in agony, the foe is unable to attack next round.

9.title: Smash nose!
9.effect: Smash nose! Inflict +2d4 damage with this strike and blood streams down the enemy’s face.

10.title: Trip!
10.effect: Trip! Foe trips on his own feet and falls prone for the remainder of the round.

11.title: Piercing strike!
11.effect: Piercing strike! Inflict +2d4 damage with this strike.

12.title: Strike to groin!
12.effect: Strike to groin!The foe must make a DC 15 Fort save or spend the next two rounds retching.

13.title: Blow smashes foe’s ankle!
13.effect: Blow smashes foe’s ankle! Foe's movement speed is reduced by half.

14.title: Strike grazes temple!
14.effect: Strike grazes temple! Blood blinds the foe for 1d3 rounds.

15.title: Stab enemy’s weapon hand!
15.effect: Stab enemy’s weapon hand! The weapon is lost and knocked 1d10+5 feet away.

16.title: Narrowly avoid foe’s counterstrike!
16.effect: Narrowly avoid foe’s counterstrike! Inflict normal damage and make another attack roll. If the second attack hits, you inflict an additional +1d6 damage.

17.title: Blow to throat!
17.effect: Blow to throat! Foe staggers around for 2 rounds and is unable to speak, cast spells, or attack.

18.title: Foe falls into your attack!
18.effect: Foe falls into your attack! Foe takes +2d6 damage from the strike and curses your luck.

19.title: Miracle strike!
19.effect: Miracle strike! The foe must make a DC 20 Fort save or fall unconscious.

20+.title: Lucky blow dents foe’s skull!
20+.effect: Lucky blow dents foe’s skull! Inflict +2d6 damage with this strike. If the foe has no helm, he suffers a permanent loss of 1d4 Int.

CRIT_II.name: Crit Table II
CRIT_II.description: Critical hits table II for Thieves and Elves.

0-.title: Miss!
0-.effect: Miss! Hesitation costs you the perfect strike!

1.title: Strike misses critical organs!
1.effect: Strike misses critical organs! Inflict a paltry +2d3 damage with this strike.

2.title: Slashes to head removes foe’s ear!
2.effect: Slashes to head removes foe’s ear! Inflict +1d6 damage with this strike and leave the enemy with a nasty scar.

4.title: Blow to chest staggers foe!
4.effect: You can make an immediate free attack.

5.title: Blow pierces foe’s kidneys!
5.effect: Inflict +3d3 damage with this strike, and the foe is stunned for 1 round.

6.title: Foe dazed by ferocious attack!
6.effect: Foe's speed and actions are reduced by half.

7.title: Grazed vital organ
7.effect: Strike to chest grazes vital organ. Inflict +3d4 damage with this strike.

8.title: Cut face
8.effect: Strike cuts a line down foe’s face. He is blinded by blood for 1d4 rounds.

9.title: Foe falls prone
9.effect: Foe stumbles over his own limbs, falling prone. Make another attack.

10.title: Masterful strike
10.effect: Masterful strike! Inflict +2d6 damage with this strike.

11.title: Severed larynx
11.effect: Strike severs larynx. Foe is reduced to making wet fish noises.

12.title: Savage strike
12.effect: Savage strike! Foe must succeed on a Fort save (DC 10 + PC level) or faint from the pain.

13.title: Disoriented foe
13.effect: Foe disoriented by quick strikes. Foe suffers a -4 penalty to attack rolls for 1d4 rounds.

14.title: Head strike
14.effect: Strike to head. Foe must make a Fort save (DC 10 + PC level) or fall unconscious.

15.title: Driven to ground
15.effect: Blow drives foe to ground. Inflict +2d6 damage with this strike, and the enemy is knocked prone.

16.title: Eye popped
16.effect: Lightning-fast shot to the face pops the foe’s eye like a grape. Foe is permanently blinded in one eye and can take no actions for 1d3 rounds.

17.title: Pierced lung
17.effect: Strike pierces lung. Inflict +2d6 damage with this strike, and the foe can take only one action on his next turn.

18.title: Back of head
18.effect: Devastating strike to back of head. Inflict +1d8 damage with this strike, and the foe must make a Fort save (DC 10 + PC level) or fall unconscious.

19.title: Severed artery
19.effect: Attack severs major artery. Inflict +1d10 damage with this strike, and the foe must make a Fort save (DC 10 + PC level) or fall unconscious from shock and massive blood loss.

20.title: Throat slashed
20.effect: Throat slashed! Inflict +2d6 damage with this strike, and the foe must make a Fort save (DC 13 + PC level) or die in 1d4 rounds.

21.title: Spinal column
21.effect: Strike pierces spinal column. Inflict +3d6 damage with this strike, and the foe must make a Fort save (DC 15 + PC level) or suffer paralysis.

22.title: Chest skewered
22.effect: Chest skewered, spearing a variety of organs. Inflict +2d6 damage with this strike, and the foe must make a Fort save (DC 13 + PC level) or die in 1d4 rounds.

23.title: Through ear canal
23.effect: Strike through ear canal enters the brain. Ear wax instantly removed, and the foe must make a Fort save (DC 15 + PC level) or die instantly. Inflict an extra +2d6 damage on successful save.

24+.title: Through the heart
24+.effect: Strike through heart! Inflict +3d6 damage with this strike, and the foe must make a Fort save (DC 20 + PC level) or die instantly.

CRIT_III.name: Crit Table III
CRIT_III.description: Critical hits table III for Clerics, Halflings, Level 1-2 Warriors, and Level 1-3 Dwarves.

0-.title: Battle rage
0-.effect: Battle rage makes friend and foe indistinguishable. Foe is hit for +1d12 damage, and the ally nearest him is also hit by a rebounding blow for 1d4 damage.**

1.title: Savage attack
1.effect: Savage attack! Inflict +1d6 damage with this strike.

2.title: Swept off feet
2.effect: Attack sweeps foe off his feet. Next round, the enemy is prone.

3.title: Steps into attack
3.effect: Foe steps into attack. Inflict +1d8 damage with this strike.

4.title: Hammered to knees
4.effect: Powerful strike hammers foe to his knees. Make another attack.

5.title: Nose smashed
5.effect: Smash foe’s nose in an explosion of blood. Inflict +1d6 damage with this strike, and the foe loses his sense of smell for 1d4 hours.

6.title: Brutal torso strike
6.effect: Brutal strike to torso. Inflict +1d8 damage with this strike, and the foe suffers multiple broken ribs.

7.title: Weapon knocked away
7.effect: Strike to hand knocks weapon into the air. The weapon lands 1d20+5’ away.

8.title: Deafening blow
8.effect: Blow caroms off skull, deafening foe for 1d6 days. Inflict +1d6 damage with this strike.

9.title: Femur splintered
9.effect: Strike to leg splinters femur. Inflict +2d6 damage with this strike and foe loses 10’ of movement until healed.

10.title: Sunder weapon
10.effect: Sunder foe’s weapon! Shards of metal fill the air.*

11.title: Internal bleeding
11.effect: Strike hammers foe’s belly causing massive internal bleeding. Unless he receives magical healing, the foe dies in 1d5 hours.

12.title: Blow to cranium
12.effect: Blow to cranium staggers foe. The foe must make a Fort save (10 + PC level) or sink to floor, unconscious.

13.title: Jaw broken
13.effect: Strike breaks foe’s jaw. Blood and shattered teeth ooze down the foe’s face. Inflict +1d8 damage with this strike.

14.title: Torso hammered
14.effect: Attack hammers foe’s torso. Inflict +2d8 damage with this strike.

15.title: Shoulder dislocated
15.effect: Strike dislocates shoulder! Inflict +1d8 damage and shield arm hangs loosely by muscle and skin; no AC bonus from shield.

16.title: Attack hand ruined
16.effect: Attack reduces foe’s attack hand to formless tissue; -4 penalty to future attacks.

17.title: Hammered prone
17.effect: Furious blows hammer target prone. Make another attack.

18.title: Bone shards to brain
18.effect: Blow hammers shards of bone into foe’s forebrain; gray matter oozes out. Inflict +1d8 damage with this strike, and the foe suffers 1d4 points of Int and Per loss.

19.title: Devastating chest strike
19.effect: Devastating strike to the chest. Inflict +2d8 damage with this strike.

20.title: Stunning chest strike
20.effect: Chest strike stuns foe for 1d3 rounds. Inflict +1d8 damage with this strike.

21.title: Shattered femur
21.effect: Strike to leg shatters femur, knocking foe to the ground. Foe’s movement drops by half. Inflict +2d8 damage with this strike and make another attack.

22.title: Weapon arm sundered
22.effect: Weapon arm sundered by strike. The weapon is lost along with any chance of making an attack with this arm.

23.title: Skull cratered
23.effect: Blow craters skull. Inflict +2d8 damage with this strike, and the target permanently loses 1d4 Int and Per.

24.title: Throat masterstroke
24.effect: Masterful strike to throat. Inflict +2d8 damage with this strike and the foe staggers about gasping for air for 1d4 rounds.

25.title: Ribs through lungs
25.effect: Attack punches shattered ribs through lungs. Foe loses 50% of his remaining hit points and vomits copious amounts of blood.

26.title: Face shattered
26.effect: Attack shatters foe’s face, destroying both eyes. Inflict +2d8 damage with this strike, and the foe is permanently blinded.

27.title: Crushing chest blow
27.effect: Crushing blow hammers chest. Inflict +3d8 damage with this strike, and the foe must make a Fort save (DC 15 + PC level) or be knocked unconscious.

28+.title: Spinal column destroyed
28+.effect: Blow destroys spinal column. Inflict +3d8 damage with this strike, and the foe must make a Fort save (DC 15 + PC level) or suffer paralysis.

CRIT_IV.name: Crit Table IV
CRIT_IV.description: Critical hits table IV for Level 3-4 Warriors, and Level 4+ Dwarves.

0-.title: Battle rage
0-.effect: Battle rage makes friend and foe indistinguishable. Foe is hit for +2d8 damage, and the ally nearest him is also hit by a rebounding blow for 1d4 damage.**

1.title: Herculean blow
1.effect: Herculean blow. Inflict +2d12 damage with this strike.

2.title: Ferocious strike leaves foe’s weapon hand dangling
2.effect: Ferocious strike leaves foe’s weapon hand dangling from the stump of a wrist. Inflict +1d12 damage with this strike.

3.title: Strike sweeps foe to the ground
3.effect: Strike sweeps foe to the ground. Inflict +1d12 damage with this strike and make another attack on prone enemy.

4.title: Hammering blow drives nose cartilage into brain
4.effect: Hammering blow drives nose cartilage into brain. Inflict +1d12 damage with this strike, and the foe suffers 1d6 Int loss.

5.title: Foe’s weapon shattered
5.effect: Foe’s weapon shattered.* If the foe has no weapon, inflict +2d12 damage with this strike.

6.title: Breastbone shattered
6.effect: Strike shatters foe’s breastbone. The foe must make a Fort save (DC 15 + PC level) or fall unconscious as his internal organs collapse.

7.title: Driven back by assault
7.effect: Foe driven back by furious assault. Inflict +2d12 damage with this strike, and the foe forgoes his next attack.

8.title: Concussive strike
8.effect: Concussive strike leaves foe dazed. Inflict +1d8 damage with this strike and make a second attack.

9.title: Throat to spine mush
9.effect: Blow to throat carries through to spinal column, reducing everything in between to pasty mush. Inflict +2d12 damage with this strike, and the foe loses speech for 1d4 weeks.

10.title: Temple cratered
10.effect: Blow craters temple. The foe must make a Fort save (DC 15 + PC level) or be blinded by pain and blood for 1d4 rounds.

11.title: Face reduced to formless mass
11.effect: Strike reduces face to a formless mass of flesh and bone fragments. Inflict +2d12 damage with this strike, and the foe has trouble making hard consonants.

12.title: You see red!
12.effect: You see red! Inflict +1d12 damage with this strike as you are overcome by battle rage!**

13.title: Torso organs crushed
13.effect: Hammering strike to torso crushes lesser organs into paste. Inflict +2d12 damage with this strike.

14.title: Lower limbs numbed
14.effect: Blow to spinal column numbs lower limbs. The foe suffers a -4 penalty to AC as he learns to walk again.

15.title: Fearsome strike drives enemy prone
15.effect: Fearsome strike drives enemy to the bloodsplattered floor. Foe cowers in fear, prone, for 1d4 rounds.

16.title: Shield shattered
16.effect: Blow shatters shield. Inflict +2d12 damage with this strike. If the foe has no shield, he is stunned by pain for 1d4 rounds.

17.title: Kneecap explodes
17.effect: Foe’s kneecap explodes into red mist. Foe’s movement drops to 0’, and you make another attack.

18.title: Frontal lobotomy
18.effect: Frontal lobotomy. Inflict +1d12 damage with this strike, and the foe must make a Fort save (DC 15 + PC level) or suffer amnesia. The foe is stunned for 1d4 rounds, regardless.

19.title: Strike to weapon arm
19.effect: Strike to weapon arm. Foe takes triple damage from his own weapon as it is hammered into his face. Foe drops weapon in dumbfounded awe.

20.title: Spinal cord crushed
20.effect: Blow crushes spinal cord. Inflict +3d12 damage with this strike, and the foe must make a Fort save (DC 15 + PC level) or suffer permanent paralysis.

21.title: Organs reduced to jelly
21.effect: Blow reduces internal organs to jelly. Death is inevitable in 1d8 rounds.

22.title: Disemboweled
22.effect: Target is disemboweled, spilling his entrails onto the ground. The foe dies of shock in 1d6 rounds.

23.title: Heart exploded
23.effect: Strike to chest explodes heart. Inflict +3d12 damage with this strike, and the foe must make a Fort save (DC 15 + PC level) or die instantly.

24+.title: Skull crushed like a melon
24+.effect: Skull crushed like a melon. Inflict +3d12 damage with this strike, and the foe must make a Fort save (DC 20 + PC level) or die in 1d3 rounds.

CRIT_V.name: Crit Table V
CRIT_V.description: Critical hits table V for Level 5+ Warriors.

0-.title: Battle rage
0-.effect: Battle rage makes friend and foe indistinguishable. Foe is hit for +3d8 damage, and the ally nearest him is also hit by a rebounding blow for 1d4 damage.

1.title: Foe’s weapon shattered
1.effect: Foe’s weapon shattered. If the foe has no weapon, inflict +3d12 damage with this strike.

2.title: Furious assault
2.effect: Furious assault hurls foe back 1d10’. Any adjacent foes accidentally strike the target for damage.

3.title: Ear destroyed
3.effect: Blow to skull destroys ear. Inflict +1d12 damage with this strike, and the foe suffers permanent deafness.

4.title: Strike to gut
4.effect: Strike to gut! The foe must make a Fort save (DC 20 + PC level) or spend the next 2 rounds retching.

5.title: Wails for mercy
5.effect: Foe casts weapon away and wails for mercy. Inflict +1d12 damage with this strike and make another attack.

6.title: Scalped
6.effect: Strike scalps foe. Blood courses down his face, and the foe is effectively blinded until healed.

7.title: Entangled on weapon
7.effect: Foe entangled on your weapon, reducing his AC by -6 while caught. Make another attack.

8-12.title: You see red!
8-12.effect: You see red! Inflict +1d12 damage with this strike as you are overcome by battle rage!

13-14.title: Strike to weapon arm
13-14.effect: Strike to weapon arm. Foe takes quadruple damage from his own weapon as it is hammered into his face. Foe drops weapon in dumbfounded awe.

15.title: Shield sundered
15.effect: Blow sunders shield. Inflict +2d12 damage with this strike. If the foe has no shield, he must make a Fort save (DC 20 + PC level) or be knocked unconscious from the pain.

16.title: Spine shortened
16.effect: Strike to top of skull shortens spinal column, shortening foe by 6”. Resulting nerve damage reduces foe’s AC by -4.

17.title: Disemboweled
17.effect: Target is disemboweled, spilling his entrails onto the ground. Foe dies instantly of shock.

18.title: Face destroyed
18.effect: Blow destroys target’s face. Foe is immediately rendered blind and deaf and is now capable of only wet, gurgling sounds.

19.title: Crown removed
19.effect: Strike removes crown of target’s skull. Foe dies from exposed brain matter in 3d3 rounds.

20.title: Shield arm severed
20.effect: Blow severs shield arm. Inflict +2d12 damage with this strike. Foe’s hopes of two-handed weapon mastery dashed.

21.title: Godly attack
21.effect: Godly attack. Inflict +3d12 damage with this strike. If the target dies, move up to 10’ and make another attack on any foe within 10’.

22.title: Leg severed
22.effect: Blow severs leg. Inflict +2d12 damage with this strike, and the foe’s movement drops to zero. Foe does nothing but wail in agony for 1d4 rounds.

23.title: Skull strike
23.effect: Strike to skull stuns foe for 1d4+1 rounds and permanently reduces Int by 1d12. Make another attack on your inert foe.

24.title: Weapon arm severed
24.effect: Strike severs weapon arm. Inflict +2d12 damage with this strike, and the foe is disarmed, literally and figuratively.

25.title: Bowels voided
25.effect: Devastating strike to torso voids foe’s bowels and crushes organs into paste. Foe loses 50% of current hit points and all dignity.

26.title: Throat crushed
26.effect: Strike crushes throat. Foe begins drowning in his own blood and expires in 1d4 rounds.

27.title: Crippling blow
27.effect: Crippling blow to spine. Inflict +4d12 damage with this strike, and the foe suffers permanent paralysis.

28+.title: Decapitation
28+.effect: Foe decapitated with a single strike. You are Death incarnate. Continue to make attacks against any foes within 10’ until you miss.
